title: Which graph is net force on two ship system

content.description: Two identical spaceships are traveling in deep space, far from any planets or stars. The ships travel in the same direction, with the slower one directly behind the faster one. The ships are connected by a cable attached to a spool, so that the part of the cable outside the ships can be made longer or shorter as needed. The cable is used to bring the ships to the same speed for a transfer of cargo. The graph above shows the speed of the two ships during a 10 s interval.
content.question: Which of the following graphs best represents the net force Fnet exerted on the two-ship system?

choices.label: A straight line with negative slope starts a little more than halfway up the vertical axis and extends down and to the right, ending at the horizontal axis at 10 seconds.
A straight line with positive slope starts at the intersection of the axes and extends up and to the right, ending a little more than halfway up the vertical axis at 10 seconds.
A straight horizontal line starts a little more than halfway up the vertical axis and extends to the right, ending at 10 seconds.
A straight horizontal line starts at the intersection of the axes and extends to the right along the horizontal axis, ending at 10 seconds.

content.answer: A straight horizontal line starts a little more than halfway up the vertical axis and extends to the right, ending at 10 seconds.

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
